tool_description: Routes payment transactions to optimal gateways based on transaction details, routing rules, and gateway performance metrics.

transaction_amount.description: Transaction amount in base currency units

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code (e.g., USD, EUR)

customer_country.description: Two-letter ISO country code of customer

priority_factors.description: Priority factors for routing (cost, speed, reliability)

error_messages: Invalid currency: Currency code must be a valid ISO 4217 three-letter code
Unsupported payment method: Payment method is not supported for this merchant
No available gateways: No gateways available for the specified criteria
Invalid country code: Customer country must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code
Amount out of range: Transaction amount exceeds gateway limits
usage: Provide transaction details including amount, currency, payment_method, merchant_id, and customer_country. Optionally specify priority_factors for routing optimization.

selected_gateway.description: Name of the selected payment gateway

estimated_fee.description: Estimated processing fee for selected gateway
